name: Space Ants (Webdevalex)
description:
People destroy the earth and don't care about other living beings. That's why the insects have decided to turn their backs on the world. These are now on their way to the moon. But some insects are afraid that there is not enough space and try to kill the other species. You must protect your folk at all costs on the way to the moon.

This game was built for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 255

Repository: https://github.com/WebdevAlexTV/space-ants

Controls:
Arrow keys => Movement
Space => Shoot
